text: Alice Hathaway Lee Roosevelt (July 29, 1861 â€“ February 14, 1884) was the first wife of Teddy Roosevelt. She died in 1884. She was of Mexican descent and born in Texas. She had 1 child with her husband. Category:1884 deaths Category:First Ladies of the United States Category:Theodore Roosevelt Category:People from Texas Category:1861 births
title: Alice Hathaway Lee Roosevelt
